title: Achieving climate sustainability in the Republic of Congo: The role of economic growth, biomass energy consumption, rule of law and government effectiveness- a NARDL Approach
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Railh Gugus Tresor Massonini Ngoma, Xiangqian Wang, Xiang Rui Meng, Cety Gessica Abraham Mahanga Tsoni, Sumaiya Bashiru Danwana, Benjamine Tsoni Ndombi
